sentences.sentence: With the development of Internet, more and more people start to use BBS forum over Internet as their tool obtaining messages and communions.
sentences.translation: 随着互联网的迅猛发展，越来越多的人开始使用网上BBS论坛来成为他们信息获取的手段和交流的平台。

sentences.sentence: Since the trend of globalization has become irresistible, the increasing communions will effectively improve mutual understanding and friendship.
sentences.translation: 由于全球化的趋势不可阻挡，越来越多的文化交流将有效地促进共同的理解与友谊。
